dataset.title: Insect data from Kuparuk River rock scrubs, 15 Jul 95 and 27 Jul 95, Arctic LTER 1995.

abstract.para: Insect data from Kuparuk River rock scrubs, 15 Jul 95 and 27 Jul 95. Includes total numbers, length measurements, and genus.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications

A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:
Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Near the Toolik Lake Research Station, approximately 1 km upstream and 2 km downstream of where the Kuparuk River crosses the Dalton Highway.

description.para:
For Archival Use:
DATE RECEIVED: DATA FILE ENTERED BY: DATA FILE VALIDATION: NAME: DATE:

para.literalLayout: Several rocks with a combined surface area 0.0363 m2 were scrubbed in a plastic tub with a nylon brush to remove insects. The scrub water was then preserved in ethanol for later sorting and processing. Two samples were collected at each station for each sampling date. The stations are named by their distance (km) from the original postion of the fertilization dripper. (A "-" denotes stations upstream of the dripper). The samples were sorted, identified, counted, and measured using a digitizing pad in Duluth.
Notes: All insect measurements are from larval forms unless noted otherwise.

Variable descrip. Precis./Units Coded Missing (Y/N) Values SITE Oksrukuyik Creek y DATE date DDMMMYY n TYPE bottom, drift, or pool sample n SPECIES abbreviation of insect measured n STATION distance from original dripper, meters n TRIAL repetition number 1 or 2 n LENGTH length of insect mm n # UN-MEASURED # of bugs counted, but not measured n COMMENTS notes about data, (this column blank) n (12) CALCULATIONS Variable Formula
